title: account email address recovery
body:
i forgot the email address i used for my account and this is my main account ... -_- i remember the password of the email i just cant remember the email address for the life of meeEEee
is there any way to be able to see the email for my account because riot star's out the email ??!?!?!?!!?{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the option "I need help recovering my account". They'll be able to help you get everything straightened out there once you're verified as the account creator ^_^!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=zAw6IKtu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-07-23T22:37:01.782+0000)
>
> Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) by picking the option "I need help recovering my account". They'll be able to help you get everything straightened out there once you're verified as the account creator ^_^!

ok .. thank you
